about_me.des: Profesionally I am main Android Developer for Docplanner, where I write on Kotlin. I am also doing Machine Learning projects. I write articles and finish studying Computer Science. Occasionally I have a pleasure to make some lecture. Mostly about Kotlin, Android and RxJava. Together with my girlfriend we created Nootro - startup that is producing and selling supplements for brain

projects.DocplannerDoctor: Mobile application for Docplanner. It allows doctors to easly manage their schedule and contact with patients.
projects.WartaMobile: Mobile application made for Warta - polish popular insurance company. Application sarve for Warta clients to help them easly and quickly go through process of closing insurance claim.
projects.KotlinWonders: Artificiall intelligence for "7 wonders" board game. Written completly functionally in Kotlin.
projects.KotlinPreferences: Kotlin Android Library, that makes preference usage simple and fun.
projects.Nootro: Startup creating and selling brain improvement supplement.
projects.ActivityStarter: Android Library that provide simpler way to start the Activities with multiple arguments.

career.docplanner_des: Main Android Developer creating doctor and patient mobile applications.
career.apreel_des: Creation of Warta Mobile application for Warta.
career.samsung_des: Development of RTL - remote testing tool for Android Samsung devices.
career.college_des: I finish Telecommunication on EITI and I started Computer Science.

speaking.reactivex: Article 'ReactiveX - reactive programming in nearly any language'
